name: google-cloud-cpp-development
description: Describes the vcpkg dependencies for vcpkg development.

dependencies.$description: If cross-compiling, we need the gRPC protoc plugin on the 'host' environment.
dependencies.name: grpc

dependencies.$description: If cross-compiling, we need the protoc compiler on the 'host' environment.

dependencies.$description: Only used for the docfx feature.
dependencies.name: pugixml

dependencies.$description: Only used for the docfx feature.
dependencies.name: yaml-cpp
